name: ALORAIR App Control Commercial Dehumidifier With Pump Industrial Dehumidifiers with Drain Hose, for Water Damage Restore, Flood Repair, Large Space, Job Sites (Blue)
short_description: App Control & Dry anywhere: MONITOR THE RESTORATION PROCESS ON THE GO! Our free AlorAir DryEasy mobile app is included with the unit upon purchase. Commercial Dehumidifier, Moisture Removal Capacity 180 PPD at Saturation condition and 85 Pint at AHAM only with 5.62A, Super-Efficient System, fits into small spaces, Secure, compact stacking – transport multiple units on a hand truck.
COMMERCIAL, INDUSTRIAL, and PERSONAL USE: Ideal for Carpet Cleaning, Basements/Cellars, Laundries, De-Flooding, Offices, Laboratories, Tradesmen, Garages.

Design with humanized: Onboard storage for 19.6 ft power cord and 19.6 ft condensate hose. Convenient storage for the power cord and drain hose. MERV-8. APP Control, Automatic Digital Humidistat Control, Memory Starting, Timer, Automatic Digital Humidistat Control. Industrial Dehumidifier with Condensate Pump.

Memory Starting, Auto Shut Off: Comes back after a power failure, no need to turn on manually. The clear LCD display has no complicated function button, Temperature, and Humidity Display at Both Inlet and Outlet sides.

5 Years Limited Warranty: Safety tested our Storm LGR Extreme WiFI industrial dehumidifier is fully compliant with the electrical safety ETL. Every AlorAir dehumidifier comes with a 5-year limited warranty.

Automatic Defrost: Our advanced auto-defrosting system continuously monitors the ambient temperature using built-in sensors. When the temperature is detected to be low, the unit initiates an automatic defrost cycle to prevent frost buildup and related issues. During this process, the compressor temporarily stops while the fan continues to operate, allowing the frost to thaw. Once the defrost cycle is complete, the dehumidifier resumes normal operation. This feature conserves energy and helps extend the lifespan of the unit.

Kindly Note：To determine which app to download, check the manufacture date on your unit's data plate. 1. If your unit was manufactured before April 30, 2023, download the AlorAir-R App. 2. If your unit was manufactured on or after April 30, 2023, download the AlorAir-R Lite App. Then, proceed with the instructions provided in the box. Both apps only support a 2.4 GHz network. For a smoother connection, please disable the 5 GHz network on your router.

Please be advised that the Wi-Fi application may exhibit compatibility issues with certain Android devices. Prior to making a purchase, we recommend visiting the Google Play Store to verify the app's availability for download on your specific device. If the application is not available for download, it indicates that your device is not compatible. For any issues or further assistance, please contact our customer service team.

EFFICIENTLY LOWERS HUMIDITY: Perfect dehumidifier for high humidity in your home, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, caravan, garage, closet. Like all mini dehumidifiers, optimal operating temperature is 59-86°F. It will not work below 41°F.

AWARD WINNING BRAND: Pro Breeze is a world leader in small dehumidifiers for bathrooms, bedrooms, RV, Basements and was awarded one of America's Best Home and Garden Brands in 2022. Trust Pro Breeze - the only dehumidifier you need

short_description: 2X SEMICONDUCTOR CONDENSERS: In order to improve the efficiency, BREEZOME dehumidifiers equipped with DUAL semiconductor condensers which almost double the effect of other small dehumidifiers. It effectively absorb up to 700ml excess moisture per day (Tested in 86°F, 80% RH which can achieve optimal performance). QUIET SLEEP MODE & COLORFUL LIGHT: Our dehumidifiers for bedroom not only have a power mode but also a 35dB quiet sleep mode to meet your various needs. There's an adjustable night light that can change colors and create a comfortable atmosphere.

name: Midea 1,500 Sq. Ft. Energy Star Certified Dehumidifier With Reusable Air Filter 22 Pint - Ideal For Basements, Large & Medium Sized Rooms, And Bathrooms (White)
short_description: 1,500 SQ. FT. DEHUMIDIFIER – Removes up to 22 pints of moisture per day with an adjustable humidity setting from 35% to 85%. Perfect for use in basement, bathroom, bedroom, office, kitchen, cellar, or crawlspace. Maintain a healthy 45%-55% humidity range.
ULTRA QUIET OPERAION – This model has quiet operation as 47 dBA. Enjoy sleep, a good book, or your favorite show without the disturbing noise of a traditional dehumidifier.
ENERGY STAR CERTIFIED- This unit is ENERGY STAR Certified and saves 31% energy when compared to traditional dehumidifiers.

SMART CONTROL -This dehumidifier is Wi-Fi enabled and can be controlled from anywhere through the cloud using the SmartHome app on iOS or Android. You can also use voice commands throughout your house, office, or apartment using Alexa or Google Assistant.

SIMPLE DRAINAGE – Simply empty the water tank when it is full or connect a standard hose (not included) to the built-in socket for continuous draining. The dehumidifier automatically stops with a full water tank and restarts after the tank is emptied.

EASY TO USE – This unit was designed with a clean, sleek look to fit the style of any home, apartment, or office. With 360° rotatable wheels, digital control panel, and handles, easily move this dehumidifier to any room and use it with ease.

INNOVATIVE FEATURES - Features such as auto defrost function and auto restart when the power goes out make this unit reliable and easy to use. Customize your settings with the turbo mode for maximum moisture removal or the built-in programmable timer.
product_description: The Midea 22 Pint Dehumidifier offers 1,500 Sq. Ft coverage and is able to remove 22 pints of moisture a day with its 0.8 gallon bucket and adjust humidity up to 85%. Thanks to its 4-wheel design, you can easily move this dehumidifier to any room and enjoy automatic dehumidification and climate control at the push of a button. With this model, you can even dehumidify when you're away with the convenient timer function for increased control and efficiency. Portable Design - Sturdy four-wheel design for easy portability. 0.8 Gallon Bucket - Removes up to 22 pints of moisture from the air per day. EasyTimer - Built-in timer offers increased control and efficiency. *Please note: depending on the climate in your area, as well as room size, you may need to purchase a larger unit for best effect Warranty: 1 Year Parts & Labor Warranty.

name: 52 Pint Basement Dehumidifier with Drain Hose, 3.3ft, Dehumidifier for Bedroom and Bathroom, Most Efficient Energy Star 2024, 6L Water Tank, Maximum Applicable Area 4500 Sq.Ft
short_description: Tackle Basement Dampness | 52 Pint/Day + 3.3ft Drainage Tube.Say goodbye to damp, stuffy basements and the hassle of emptying water buckets—this dehumidifier is built for rainy seasons and humid climates. With a powerful 52-pint daily capacity, it zips through excess moisture, keeping your space dry even during extended downpours.The included 3.3ft (1m) drainage tube lets you connect it directly to a floor drain or sump pump, so you’ll never have to empty a messy bucket again.

Super Energy-Efficient | Save 219kWh/Year with ENERGY STAR .Why spend extra to keep your space dry? This ENERGY STAR-certified dehumidifier cuts energy use drastically. Replace a standard model and run it 24/7, and you’ll save ~219 kWh/year. Efficient, eco-friendly, and easy on your wallet—perfect for budget conscious homeowners.

Covers 4,500 sq ft of Space | Your Whole Home’s Humidity Fighter.Don’t waste money on multiple small dehumidifiers. This powerful unit is designed to handle ​up to 4,500 square feet, making it ideal for large spaces like open-concept living rooms, expansive basements, or even multi-car garages. One machine keeps every corner of your home comfortable, no matter how big the area.

3 Smart Modes for Every Need | Sleep, Dry Clothes, Auto.​Sleep Mode: Quietly runs at just 30 dB (softer than a library whisper) while you rest—no more noisy disruptions during the night. ​Dry Clothes Mode: Cut drying time by 30% for wet towels, gym gear, or damp clothes left out in the rain. ​Auto Mode: Smart sensors adjust fan speed automatically based on humidity levels.

No Pump, No Problem | Gravity Drainage Works Only When Tubing Stays Low .This dehumidifier uses **gravity** (not a noisy pump) to drain water—so it’s simple, quiet, and low-maintenance. But here’s the key: For gravity to work, the end of the 3.3ft drainage tube **must stay below** the machine’s water outlet. If the tubing is higher than the outlet, water can’t flow out on its own—no pumping, no draining, just a useless machine. Keep it low, and it’ll keep your space dry without a hitch.
